channel.title: Most Common Models Fixed
channel.description:
Since, people have been releasing half done models, which look awful ingame, have a bad color, or make your character go invisible, I decided to just redo a bunch of models.
What I did: Fit it correctly to the player, gave the models real colors, (bandos has bandos colors), give the model 10 priorities, so you cannot see your character over your model.
First off, we are going to fix the ...pickup model, junk most of you still have, even though its been released.
Go and find the line in Class8 [code] class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);[/code]
After it add
[code] if (i > 7955) { class8.aStringArray168 = null; }[/code]
Now for the models.
Dragon Bow: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?944etb4bl1mecw1]http://www.mediafire.com/?944etb4bl1mecw1[/URL]
Bandos Spear: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437426.msg3214563.html#msg3214563
Bandos Kiteshield: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?hibs71nfnf3qjfw]http://www.mediafire.com/?hibs71nfnf3qjfw[/URL]
Bandos Gloves: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?hibs71nfnf3qjfw]http://www.mediafire.com/?hibs71nfnf3qjfw[/URL]
Bandos Scim: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?6yzwtzasx6jr2om]http://www.mediafire.com/?6yzwtzasx6jr2om[/URL]
Bow of Flames: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?7u66s2bz2k6twdb]http://www.mediafire.com/?7u66s2bz2k6twdb[/URL]
Bandos Crossbow: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?n89wvmlc8g5k577]http://www.mediafire.com/?n89wvmlc8g5k577[/URL]
Dragon Crossbow: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?uzjllp0wp25qcu6]http://www.mediafire.com/?uzjllp0wp25qcu6[/URL]
A package of all them together in 1 link:
[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?uzjllp0wp25qcu6]http://www.mediafire.com/?uzjllp0wp25qcu6[/URL]
[URL=http://uppit.com/nat62cj8nrms/Models_Fixed.rar]Models Fixed.rar - 21 Kb[/URL]
I'm not getting pictures, because you should know what they looked like, so just imagine them twice as good.
Just replace these with your original models, these should come with ints.

item.title: Most Common Models Fixed
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:350096”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=446463.msg3696734#msg3696734 date=1312484572]

I would love you forever if you fixed the granite shield in 634 cache

Whats wrong with it? I’ll do it if you can upload me the model… (or pm me a model dump)
[/quote]If you look at 634 item revision, the granite shield is like white in inventories/shops but shows up correctly when wielded.[/quote]
Sounds like someone didn’t get the model loaded properly. I’d have to be able to either hard code the model in, or replace it in the cache (which I can’t do either).

Read full topic

[/quote]
Whats wrong with it? I’ll do it if you can upload me the model… (or pm me a model dump)[/quote]If you look at 634 item revision, the granite shield is like white in inventories/shops but shows up correctly when wielded.

I’m going to bump, as I still see all these models broken in clients.

If anyone has a problem pm me.

item.title: Most Common Models Fixed
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:2, topic:350096”]Nice!

Only these? =O[/quote]

Ha, ya, I redid them for my client, but i stopped doing 317s, so I decided to release.

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:350096”]Personally I don’t even like customs in clients, but that’s just me.
While you’re doing a nice thing, you should let people get the coding experience by doing it themselves. (thnx Dylan)[/quote]

Coding experience? You mean modeling? Most people don’t know whats wrong or how to fix.

Read full topic
